title: Dirty Page behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs to be improved
description: Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. When prompted with 'Do you want to save the changes?', selecting 'Yes' would save the changes, 'No' would discard the changes, and 'Cancel' would do nothing and remain on the Source page. Additionally, the dialog is titled 'Error'.
OB: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that you need to save your changes.
EB: The user should be provided with clearer instructions on how to save or discard their changes, and the error message should be more informative.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the XML Report Designer editor.
2. Switch to the 'source' view of the Layout Editor.
3. Make some changes to the XML.
4. Try to switch back to the Layout view.
5. Observe the error message 'Source page is dirty.'
